title: Should I use this to get an idea of cutoffs?
content: Is it realistic to use this to get an idea of this year's cutoffs? (non-CET cutoffs).

comments.body: Same question getting 19XX rank so according to that I can get ec campus cse
Yes kind off but jee has slightly more seats now that it was through pessat
So if I have 19XX rank can I get cse aiml at rr

https://preview.redd.it/d0pu05ityk2f1.png?width=1079&format=png&auto=webp&s=41f5223d116b7c92ddfad53e2a81ba533c59246c

Used chatgpt to convert 60% seats cutoff to 75%
Aren't there more seats compared to pessat last year  ?
Don't use chatgpt for such conversions honestly, kabhi kabar bohot inaccurate batata hai
im prolly understanding this wrong, but shouldnt you convert 40% seat availability (PESSAT) to 45% (JEE MAINS this year)?
Question , so pessat seats are now both jee and cet so will the jee cutoff really be same as last yr pessat ..or less/more

It was 60% for pessat

45% JEE, 40% KCET, 15% Management
But there's kcet (kea councelling) and kcet (pes councelling) too right

it went down to 5k last year in round 2.. so cant tell anything rn...
What was your jee rank?

ECE in first round and AIML in 2nd round for RR Campus you can get cse in ec campus

This is according to previous year pessat ranking
Yeah I registered for both of them idk what the cutoff would be

1.09 Lakh
what can i get for 61XX rank??
Wb 190X

I dont think you should,  seats are different now and last year the cutoffs were also down (your data is 2 years old)
And idk if it’s fair to compare Pessat and JEE for the ranks
any idea on what I might get at 16XX rank ?
How many seats are there in pes for cse and cse aiml combined??
13xx pe kya milega! lol idc 5.1 lakh nhi fukna iss college ke liye
there was no pessat this year?
last year there were 288 seats for pessat
whats ur jee rank?

Same as above as per last pessat cutoffs cs usually closes in under 1k

IDK how will it be this time for you guys as jee is taken into consideration cut offs may vary it is completely new.

For cs you should 1k in kcet and for aiml 1.5k in kcet
